FuncDef:
The pim bfd command enables BFD for IPv4 PIM on an interface and adjusts PIM BFD parameters on the interface.
The undo pim bfd command disables BFD for IPv4 PIM on an interface and restores the default PIM BFD parameter settings on the interface. The pim bfd command enables BFD for IPv4 PIM on an interface and adjusts PIM BFD parameters on the interface. The undo pim bfd command disables BFD for IPv4 PIM on an interface and restores the default PIM BFD parameter settings on the interface. By default, BFD for IPv4 PIM is not enabled on an interface.
CLIs: undo pim bfd { min-tx-interval <tx-value> | min-rx-interval <rx-value> | detect-multiplier <multiplier-value> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the minimum interval for transmitting BFD packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 1000. The default value is 1000.

Specifies the minimum interval for receiving BFD packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 1000. The default value is 1000.

Specifies the local multiplier of BFD packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 50. The default value is 3.
